name: My Life Among The Bricks
description:
See New York City like you've never seen it before in this story-driven 3D platformer. Play as "Pajama Girl", a talented entrepreneur and technologist who wakes up one morning in her midtown-Manhattan apartment to discover that an experiment gone wrong has transformed her into a LEGO minifigure. Try to piece together the events leading up to your transformation and attempt to reverse the process!

The game features a number of story-driven objectives split across two levels (both showing New York City from a minifigure's perspective), as well as numerous "easter eggs" for the consummate LEGO fan. Both levels feature an "easy mode" toggle for novice players who still want to experience the whole story.

Originally featured in the "Unity x LEGO Microgame Build Your Own Game" challenge on LEGO Ideas. City assets created with Geopipe.
